implementation.name: Nova Configuration Factory
implementation.description: Populates an OpenEjbConfiguration object by combining the data from an openejb.conf file, the ejb-jar.xml and openejb-jar.xml from deployed bean jars, and service-jar.xml from deployed OpenEJB service implementations.
implementation.detail: The openejb.conf file is a combination of simple xml and ordinary name=value properties
A default.openejb.conf file exists if one has not yet been created
EJB jars can be loaded by specifying a directory where jars are located or by specifying the jar individually
Bean data is collected from the ejb-jar.xml and openejb-jar.xml in the beans jar
OpenEJB services and containers can be packaged, jar'ed, configured, and deployed using a service-jar.xml. This is similar to the ejb-jar.xml of enterprise beans
Deploying beans can be done manually or with the Deploy Tool
ejb-jar.xml data is validated prior to being loaded and assembled
System structure, containers, and services are validated prior to assembly
